title: Cakmak Sees 'Paradigm Shift' for Tech Companies
itunes:title: Cakmak Sees 'Paradigm Shift' for Tech Companies
description:
James Cakmak, Technology Analyst at Clockwise Capital, discusses earnings and outlook for Facebook owner Meta Platforms and Amazon.com.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
